item.title: Hello
item.description: HELM安装 Kube Prometheus监控集群 #helm https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack helm repo add prometheus-community https://prometheus-community.github.io/helm-charts helm upgrade kube-prometheus prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack -f ./kube-prometheus-stack.yaml
item.content:
HELM安装 Kube Prometheus监控集群

#helm https://artifacthub.io/packages/helm/prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack

helm repo add prometheus-community https://prometheus-community.github.io/helm-charts

helm upgrade kube-prometheus prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack -f ./kube-prometheus-stack.yaml
